title: Metamorphosis
desc:
Post 2091
Upon drawing, Discard up to 5 cards. Draw the same amount of cards. Do the following in order.
The first card drawn must have the same **color** as the first card discarded
The second card drawn must have the same **number** as the second card discarded
The third card drawn must have the same **keyword** inside of it as the third card discarded
The fourth card drawn must have been made by the same **player** as the fourth card discarded
The fifth card must be personally chosen by the host
